column1: Smoque BBQ////I visited Smoque after seeing a good review in the Reader
column2: and really liked the barbecue. We had a little bit of everything - St Louis style ribs
column7: brisket and sides were great. Pulled pork
column8: not so much. St louis ribs were meaty
column9: not fatty but not too dry. The BBQ beans were really good
column10: too. A vinegary sauce with just enough spice. The line to order snakes into the middle of the room
column11: and seating is basically family- style. I'll definitely be back.
